definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
Bilbo Baggins, hero of Tolkien's The Hobbit 霍比特人
Ardabil in Azerbaijan region of Iran

sentences.english: It took Cindy a long time to catch on to what Bill was saying.
sentences.chinese: 辛迪许久以后才突然明白比尔所说的话。

sentences.english: For one whole year Bill ignores the dog.
sentences.chinese: 整整一年，比尔忽视这个大丹犬。

sentences.english: Then why not call Bearden a Black American artist?
sentences.chinese: 那么，为什么不把比尔敦称作一个美国黑人艺术家呢？

sentences.english: Bill takes Yaoyao to Tom's birthday party.
sentences.chinese: 比尔带瑶瑶去汤姆的生日派对。

sentences.english: Largely because of the jewelry bear market, De Beers’s fortunes have sunk.
sentences.chinese: 主要因为珠宝市场熊市，德比尔斯公司资产缩水。

sentences.english: Bill must have grassed on us.
sentences.chinese: 比尔一定检举揭发了我们。

sentences.english: Bill pitched so well that everyone cheered him.
sentences.chinese: 比尔球投得那么好，大家都为他欢呼。

sentences.english: Bill was beaten black and blue by a bad boy with a traveling bag on his back.
sentences.chinese: 比尔被一个背着旅行包的坏男孩打得青一块紫一块。

sentences.english: Bill gets a kickout of listening to rock music.
sentences.chinese: 比尔从听摇滚乐中得到快乐。

sentences.english: Bill grudged Dick his prize even though he had won a better prize himself.
sentences.chinese: 比尔妒忌迪克获奖，尽管他自己获得了更高的荣誉。

sentences.english: Jane is becoming very angry at Bill's attitude.
sentences.chinese: 简对比尔的态度很生气。

sentences.english: It can't be worse, Bill, cheating again in the make-up exam.
sentences.chinese: 没什么比这更糟的了，比尔，在补考的时候又作弊。

sentences.english: Bill said that if he had the instruction manual he would know what to do.
sentences.chinese: 比尔说如果他有说明书他就知道该怎么弄了。

sentences.english: Bill broke a leg or were hospitalized to a month.
sentences.chinese: 比尔摔断了腿，被送进诊所住了一个月。

sentences.english: A:Bill, I thought you acted (the part of) Sampson wonderfully.
sentences.chinese: 比尔，我认为你扮演桑普逊这个角色相当不错。

sentences.english: Bill Murray plays the funeral director anxious to keep the cantankerous customer satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 比尔默里扮演的葬礼导演渴望保持过敏的顾客满意。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
Brown (name)/Gordon Brown (1951-), UK politician, prime minister 2007-2010
